trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Port St Lucie
There were no other sightings in Port St Lucie on or around October 12th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI had just moved back to fl from PA 5 days earlier i was staying with a friend in port saint lucie for the night i walked outside because my wife and i were having a phone argument and as i looked up to observe the stars the sky was dimly lit from the city lights when suddenly about 80 feet off the ground traveling about 100-150 miles an hour from northwest to southeast a solid black disc had flown over head silent but you could hear the air moving around its surface then as it started to disapear in the distance it made a sharp turn straight up and disapeared at about 800 miles an hour it was quick but not fast enough to break the sound barrier this is one of many brief encounters ive had and once i saw your special on discovery channel ive felt compelled to tell my stories
